row.special_powers: [ { "type": "trait", "name": "ESPIONAGE", "description": "Stealth, Improved Movement: Hindering, Improved Targeting: Hindering.", "powers": [ "stealth" ] }, { "type": "trait", "name": "MY ESPIONAGE ELITE", "description": "If Spymaster is on a Spy themed team, your maximum number of Themed Team Probability Control uses this game is 6 (instead of 3). // UNIQUE MODIFIER: Friendly characters with the Spy keyword modify defense +1 if occupying hindering terrain." }, { "type": "attack", "name": "ANTI-IRON MAN WEAPONS", "description": "FREE: Choose a standard attack power. Spymaster can use that power until your next turn.", "powers": [ "blades_claws_fangs", "energy_explosion", "pulse_wave", "quake", "super_strength", "incapacitate", "penetrating_psychic_blast", "smoke_cloud", "precision_strike", "poison", "steal_energy", "telekinesis" ] } ]

row.special_powers: [ { "type": "trait", "name": "ASSEMBLED BOLTS AND MASTERS", "description": "Once per turn when Black Knight hits, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 5-6: If your force has 3+ friendly characters with the Masters Of Evil or Thunderbolts keywords, remove an action token from Black Knight -or- give an action token to a hit target. If your force has 6+, do both." }, { "type": "trait", "name": "GIANT-MAN AND THE WASP, MY MORTAL FOES", "description": "Opposing characters with [Tiny symbol], [Giant symbol], or [Colossal symbol] modify attack -2 when attacking Black Knight." }, { "type": "attack", "name": "MY LANCE IS AN ARSENAL WITH A COUNTER TO ANY POWER", "description": "FREE: Choose a standard attack power. Black Knight can use that power until your next turn. // Opposing characters within range that can use a standard power chosen by Black Knight modify attack -1.", "powers": [ "blades_claws_fangs", "energy_explosion", "pulse_wave", "quake", "super_strength", "incapacitate", "penetrating_psychic_blast", "smoke_cloud", "precision_strike", "poison", "steal_energy", "telekinesis" ] } ]

row.name: Melter
Radioactive Man
Taskmaster
row.special_powers: [ { "type": "trait", "name": "POWER ELITE", "description": "The POWER actions of opposing character within X squares are DOUBLE POWER actions instead. X is the number of friendly characters with the Power Elite keyword with different names." }, { "type": "trait", "name": "ASSEMBLED BOLTS AND MASTERS", "description": "Once per turn when Taskmaster hits, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 5-6: If your force has 3+ friendly characters with the Masters Of Evil or Thunderbolts keywords, remove an action token from Taskmaster -or- give an action token to a hit target. If your force has 6+, do both." }, { "type": "trait", "name": "YOU FORGET THAT I TOOK ON THE AVENGERS", "description": "FREE: Choose a standard speed or defense power printed on this card. Taskmaster can use that power until your next turn.", "powers": [ "stealth", "running_shot", "leap_climb", "charge", "flurry", "energy_shield_deflection", "toughness", "combat_reflexes", "super_senses", "regeneration" ] } ]

row.special_powers: [ { "type": "trait", "name": "TAKE ON THE PROPERTIES OF ANY ELEMENT", "description": "FREE: Choose an adjacent square's terrain type, and Absorbing Man can use the corresponding powers and abilities until you choose again. (Use the Wall marker as a reminder by placing it on the chosen terrain type.) CLEAR TERRAIN: Super Senses and modify speed +2. HINDERING TERRAIN: Stealth, Regeneration and modify attack +2. BLOCKING TERRAIN: [Improved Movement: Destroy Blocking]. Super Strength, Close Combat Expert, and modify defense +2. WATER TERRAIN: Poison, Shape Change, and modify damage +2.", "powers": [ "super_senses", "stealth", "regeneration", "super_strength", "close_combat_expert", "poison", "shape_change" ] } ]
